message.content:
Match each outfit with the occasion: 

1. Black tie event
   - Tuxedo for men, floor-length gown or cocktail dress for women

2. Business meeting
   - Suit and tie for men, pant/dress suit or professional skirt/blouse combo for women

3. Day at the beach
   - Swimsuit, cover-up or shorts/tank top, flip-flops or sandals

4. Wedding guest attire
   - Men: Suit & tie (more formal) / Dress pants+sport's coat+tie(semi-formal) / Dress pants+shirt(no tie; casual)
  Women: Formal dresses/casual fancy day-dresses

5. Night out on the town:
    Men- A blazer and jeans/lists/sportcoat/combo/well-tailored-jacket/buttoned-shirt/pattern-cashmere-scarf/shawl-collar-cardigan/trousers/loafers/black-leather-belt.html">jeans/ chinos paired with a casual button-down shirt.
   
6.Job interview 
    Men- suit in black/navy-grey/light-blue-button-down-shirt/plain/matching-welt-breast-pocket/watch-cufflinks-contact-lenses-shaved-coordinated-shoes-and-hosiery"-well-groomed,-clean-cut-appearance-can-make-or-break-your-first-impression-at-an-interview-home-page>d-edication-to-making-a-good-appearance-signals-seriousness-about/"invest-in-a-good-navy/grey-black-blue-white-neglect-you-straight-points)">good-quality leather shoes>White/ light blue dress shirt,tie(optional but prefer)

7.Casual Friday office wear -
Man-Closed-toe-shoes/black-open-neck-shirt/nav
